page.title: 17Harley Fruit Shop
page.content: There are only{two}shops in{Harley}and one of them is a{fruit}and{vegetable shop. The shop also sells{lots}of other things as well, like all village shops. The shop is owned by{Mr. G. {Thompson}and he gave us a very friendly welcome. He told us that he used to work in the{Steel Works}but he got made{redundant.}With his redundancy money he bought a cottage in{Harley}which had an{old empty shop attached to it. Then he worked very hard to set up his shop. He has been in the village for about{5 years}now and the shop is doing well. He said that he{loves}living in the village and enjoys the work he is doing now. He told us that the villagers use his shop regularly but sometimes go into {Barnsley, Chapletown}or{Sheffield}to do their shopping. He said they don't often go to{Rotherham.
